import './App.css'; import io from 'socket.io-client'; import { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import {MDBBtn, MDBContainer, MDBRow, MDBCol, MDBInput } from 'mdb-react-ui-kit'; const socket = io.connect('http://localhost:3001'); function App() { const [message, setMessage] = useState(""); const [backenddenGelenMesaj, setBackenddenGelenMesaj] = useState(""); const [qrup, setQrup] = useState(""); const [name, setName] = useState(""); const eventGonder = ()=>{ socket.emit('backende_mesaj', {message, qrup, name}) } const join_qrup = ()=>{ socket.emit('join_qrup', qrup) } useEffect(()=>{ socket.on("frontende_mesaj",(data)=>{ setBackenddenGelenMesaj(`${data.name}: ${data.message}`) }) }, [socket]) return (
